name: Gone bear
description:
Gone bear is a short 3d platform game made for my shool project. Story is about a girl tries to save her teddy bear.

Build by Unity Personal and 3ds Max, 8 weeks production time, with no prior knowledge of the programs.

Suggest download the pc version.

Play tips:

Be careful with the distance when you try to jump up to attack enemies, the movement settings aren't perfect in this game since i'm a junior game creator..You might not easily to win even though my gameplay design is actually simple.

Wish you will enjoy it, please add comments if you have any advices or questions, i'll try to make it better:)

Update 11/2/2017: bug fixed.
